record.field: Karbon 300 is a compact rugged PC with integrated CAN bus, PoE+ LAN, and customizable DIO with options for cellular wireless connectivity and Movidius VPU.
Industrial Intel Braswell Fanless Computer with Dual Gb LAN
The pinnacle of embedded computing technology, combining energy-efficient quad-core processing with hardened, compact form factor. Fanless, ventless, and solid state for maximum reliability.
ASRock IMB-155 Intel Braswell Industrial Thin Mini-ITX Motherboard
Long-life, energy-efficient Mini-ITX motherboard with Braswell processing for point-of-sale (POS) and industrial automation applications.
Someone made this system just for kicks!
Harmon-Pope Customer system based on ML210G-12
